Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Though't i'd pop in here an give an introduction.

A mate of mine introduced me to this game on facebook and I must say i'm not 100% hooked, spent all of last night blowing thing up on the launch pad until I got my first satellite into a, somewhat, circular orbit. I must say I was very proud of myself.

I hail from Australia, am a pilot by trade, and a avid lover of all things space.

With that in mind, i've creating RedDragon Space Works, where we are endevouring to have a colony on all planets in the Kerbin's galaxy.

Starting small, with satellites, then a few manned orbits, up to building a station to base our interplanetary launches from, RedDragon Space Works aims to conquer all.

So, hi!
Hello Inphered and welcome to the forum, it sounds like you've got a good plan there. However you say you're not 100% hooked but you spent all last night playing, sounds like you're hooked to me.
Hahahaha, I don't know how or why the "not" is there, as I am 100% hooked.
